Name: Highway Thru Hell
Title: Sub Zero
Desc: Colin fights to recover a frozen rig; Cam has a dilemma with one of Jamie's classic wreckers.
LongDescription: A polar vortex brings extreme cold and brutal working conditions to truck drivers and heavy wrecker operators on The Coq; Colin fights to recover a frozen rig; Cam finds himself in a dilemma with one of Jamie's classic wreckers.
